snippet: A bribery trial that has threatened Bernie Ecclestone’s hold over Formula One may end with a settlement, a Munich court spokeswoman said Friday.
abstract: German court signals that bribery trial that threatens Bernie Ecclestone's hold over Formula One racing may end in a settlement.
lead_paragraph: A bribery trial that has threatened Bernie Ecclestone’s hold over Formula One may end with a settlement, a Munich court spokeswoman said Friday.

headline.main: Trial of Formula One Boss May End With Settlement
headline.print_headline: Trial of Formula One Boss May End With Settlement
